Major_Arcs.title: Saloon Scene and Initial Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting in a saloon and establishes initial character interactions and conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Scene Setting and Blonde Woman's Explanation
sub_scenes.description: The scene opens in a saloon, establishing the environment and introducing a conversation with a blonde woman explaining her situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Saloon Scene Setting
The Blonde Woman's Explanation
Conversation Continues - Man's Response and Old Timers' Wisdom

Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town and Airport Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the setting to the Ghost Town and introduces the conflict between preserving the old town and modern development plans.

sub_scenes.title: Cowboy's Lament and Modern Arrival
sub_scenes.description: A cowboy departs with nostalgic reflections, contrasted by the arrival of modern surveyors planning to demolish the Ghost Town for an airport.

narrative_arcs.title: Cowboy's Farewell and Nostalgic Reflection
Modern Arrival and Ghost Town Observation
Airport Plan and Town Demolition Imminent
Emotional Reaction to Ghost Town's Destruction

Major_Arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Relationship and Ghost Town Demolition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the relationship drama between Nan and Cal, intertwined with the backdrop of the Ghost Town's impending demolition.

sub_scenes.title: Nan and Cal's Argument and Woman's Outburst
sub_scenes.description: Nan confronts Cal about his actions while a woman reacts emotionally to the demolition of the Ghost Town.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Accusation and Cal's Defense
Woman's Reflection on Past Relationship with Cal
Ghost Town Demolition and Woman's Outburst

sub_scenes.title: Business Matters and Father-Daughter Conflict
sub_scenes.description: Business discussions about cattle and the airport lead to a conflict between Nan and her father regarding horses for construction.

narrative_arcs.title: Cattle Shipping and Airport Business Discussion
Horses for Construction and Father-Daughter Conflict

sub_scenes.title: Reassurance and Nan's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Nan is reassured about Cal's love by her family but resolves to seek clarity directly from him.

Chasing Cal

Business Deal and Commitment

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal have an intense conversation leading to Cal's departure, followed by Nan's reaction and a time skip.

Reaction to Departing Horses

sub_scenes.title: Reunion and Snowstorm
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal reunite in a snowy setting, followed by the onset of a severe snowstorm and its impact.

Concern Over Livestock and Fodder Shortage

Cal's Decisive Action to Save the Cattle

sub_scenes.title: Despair, Hope, and Romantic Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: Despair inside the house is interrupted by the arrival of a plane with fodder, bringing hope and leading to romantic reassurance between Nan and Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Indoor Despair and a Glimmer of Hope

Hope and Romantic Reassurance

Major_Arcs.title: Showdown in Cowtown and Jeff's Gun Obsession
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to Cowtown, depicting a showdown involving Chane Benson and introducing the character of Jeff and his concerning gun obsession.

Major_Arcs.title: Clyde, Sally, and Chane Benson - Article and Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around Clyde's article about Chane Benson, Sally's reaction, and the subsequent confrontations.

sub_scenes.title: Article Controversy and Sally's Fear
sub_scenes.description: Controversy erupts over Clyde's article calling Chane Benson a killer, leading to Sally's fear for Clyde's safety and Clyde's reassurance.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner with Chane and Jeff's Jealousy Eruption
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the dinner invitation to Chane Benson, leading to a moonlit walk and Jeff's jealous and violent reaction.

sub_scenes.description: A polite dinner conversation transitions into a moonlit walk between Sally and Chane.
